price: Ngaho tegereza umunsi ikirere kizazana umwotsi ugaragara,
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
